content: As you approach it, you should see a small lot of bubbles coming up from the center of it. When you get closer to it, the Water-Wood Beast will appear.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Foothills_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Foothills Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Deer Sight Forest' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief - Water-Wood Beast'.
The content is as follows:
As you approach it, you should see a small lot of bubbles coming up from the center of it. When you get closer to it, the Water-Wood Beast will appear.
